segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!
segments.translated_content: 大家好！

segments.content: Once again this week, we have a good mix of articles and releases.
segments.sourceMdx: Once again this week, we have a good mix of articles and releases.
segments.translated_content: 本周我们再次汇集了丰富的文章与版本更新。

segments.content: Firefox 121 is out, making [CSS `:has()`](https://twitter.com/stefanjudis/status/1737366970566053927) officially cross-browser supported 🥲
segments.sourceMdx: Firefox 121 is out, making [CSS `:has()`](https://twitter.com/stefanjudis/status/1737366970566053927) officially cross-browser supported 🥲
segments.translated_content: Firefox 121正式发布，标志着[CSS `:has()`](https://twitter.com/stefanjudis/status/1737366970566053927)获得全浏览器支持 🥲

segments.content: That's the last issue of the year. The newsletter should be back on January 3.
segments.sourceMdx: That's the last issue of the year. The newsletter should be back on January 3.
segments.translated_content: 这是本年度的最后一期通讯。我们将在1月3日恢复更新。

segments.content: Happy New Year and Merry Christmas everyone, and thank you for reading me throughout the year ❤️️
segments.sourceMdx: Happy New Year and Merry Christmas everyone, and thank you for reading me throughout the year ❤️️
segments.translated_content: 祝各位新年快乐、圣诞愉快，感谢大家这一年的持续关注 ❤️️

segments.content: Learn React.js from the ground up to advanced topics like performance, testing, and code quality. Start by building a real-world app in the Complete Introduction to React. Continue with Intermediate React, integrating the most popular tools from the ecosystem. Then learn performance, TypeScript, and even Next.js, the fullstack React framework!
segments.sourceMdx: Learn React.js from the ground up to advanced topics like performance, testing, and code quality. Start by building a real-world app in the Complete Introduction to React. Continue with Intermediate React, integrating the most popular tools from the ecosystem. Then learn performance, TypeScript, and even Next.js, the fullstack React framework!
segments.translated_content: 从React.js基础到性能优化、测试与代码质量等高级主题系统学习。首先通过《React完全入门》构建真实应用，接着用《React进阶》整合生态流行工具，最后掌握性能优化、TypeScript乃至全栈框架Next.js！

segments.content: [![React Aria Components 1.0](/emails/issues/167/reactaria.jpg)](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)
segments.sourceMdx: [![**React Aria Components 1.0**](/emails/issues/167/reactaria.jpg)](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)
segments.translated_content: [![**React Aria Components 1.0**](/emails/issues/167/reactaria.jpg)](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)

segments.content: [**React Aria Components 1.0**](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)
segments.sourceMdx: [**React Aria Components 1.0**](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)
segments.translated_content: [**React Aria Components 1.0**](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-12-20.html)

segments.content: Devon just 🐦 [announced](https://twitter.com/devongovett/status/1737516074663362843) the stable release of React Aria Components 1.0. Over 40 components with built-in behavior, adaptive interactions, top-tier accessibility, and internationalization out of the box, ready for your styles.
segments.sourceMdx: Devon just 🐦 [announced](https://twitter.com/devongovett/status/1737516074663362843) the stable release of React Aria Components 1.0. Over 40 components with built-in behavior, adaptive interactions, top-tier accessibility, and internationalization out of the box, ready for your styles.
segments.translated_content: Devon刚在🐦[推特宣布](https://twitter.com/devongovett/status/1737516074663362843)React Aria Components 1.0稳定版发布。40+组件内置行为、自适应交互、顶级无障碍支持及开箱即用的国际化方案，静候您的样式定制。

segments.content: [![React Hydration Overlay](/emails/issues/167/hydration.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)
segments.sourceMdx: [![**React Hydration Overlay**](/emails/issues/167/hydration.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)
segments.translated_content: [![**React Hydration Overlay**](/emails/issues/167/hydration.jpg)](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)

segments.content: [**React Hydration Overlay - Easily Squash Hydration Errors**](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)
segments.sourceMdx: [**React Hydration Overlay - Easily Squash Hydration Errors**](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)
segments.translated_content: [**React Hydration Overlay - 轻松解决水合错误**](https://www.builder.io/blog/announcing-react-hydration-overlay)

segments.content: A brand-new project that permits to add a handy error overlay to help debugging hydration errors. For now, this can be added to Next.js sites thanks to a Webpack plugin, but this is a much-needed feature that we all hope to see land in React core.
segments.sourceMdx: A brand-new project that permits to add a handy error overlay to help debugging hydration errors. For now, this can be added to Next.js sites thanks to a Webpack plugin, but this is a much-needed feature that we all hope to see land in React core.
segments.translated_content: 这个全新项目提供了便捷的错误覆盖层来辅助调试水合错误。目前可通过Webpack插件在Next.js站点使用，但这项众望所归的功能有望未来集成至React核心。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Take the Developer Nation Survey - A virtual goody bag packed with free data, promo codes for event tickets, courses, tools & platforms is waiting at the end of the survey!](https://developereconomics.net/?member_id=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=nl_ad3)
* 👀 [Remix PR - unstable\_serverBundles - split your route tree](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8332)
* 📖 [React Docs Update](https://github.com/reactwg/server-components/discussions/7): an overview of all the new official docs pages that were recently published on React.dev, including `use`, `cache`, `form` and many other experimental/canary APIs. There's even a "Coming Soon" section referencing docs for new [static resource preloading APIs](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459).
* 📖 [Updated Next.js testing docs - using App Router and TypeScript](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/testing)
* 📜 [Concurrent React, External Stores, and Tearing](https://interbolt.org/blog/react-ui-tearing/): An advanced article explaining how React can end up displaying an inconsistent UI (tearing). `useSyncExternalStore` helps to render a consistent UI, but it can also de-optimize your React transitions. See also the [Tearable Dots interactive demo](https://tearabledots.com/).
* 📜 [Explaining React's cache Function](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/explaining-reacts-cache-function): interactive article presenting the experimental React API, and how it differs from `useMemo`. It permits cross-component caching and can be used to preload data.
* 📜 [How to Get Rid of “Window is Not Defined” and Hydration Mismatch Errors in Next.js](https://medium.com/@eric.burel/how-to-get-rid-of-window-is-not-defined-and-hydration-mismatch-errors-in-next-js-567cc51b4a17): Shares 5 tips to avoid React hydration problems.
* 📜 [React Tricks: Fast, Fit and Fun](https://molefrog.com/notes/react-tricks): React perf lessons learned from building Wouter, a React router.
* 📜 [Netlify’s Disingenuous Survey-based Attack on Next.js (and Eleventy, too)](https://www.zachleat.com/web/netlify-and-nextjs/): Eleventy creator's criticism of how Netlify presented their State of Web Dev survey results.
* 📜 [Upcoming React and React-Native Conferences for 2024](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/upcoming-react-and-react-native-conferences-for-2024)
* 📜 [What is Reactivity?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-reactivity)
* 📜 [What are React Server Actions?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-are-react-server-actions)
* 📜 [What is React Suspense and Async Rendering?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-react-suspense-and-async-rendering)
* 📜 [The Complete Guide To React Suspense](https://www.debugbear.com/blog/guide-to-react-suspense)
* 📜 [Migrating from Jest to Vitest for your React Application](https://dev.to/opensauced/migrating-from-jest-to-vitest-for-your-react-application-1b75)
* 📜 [Access the Search Params of a Request in Remix](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/access-the-search-params-of-a-request-in-remix)
* 📦 [Remix 2.4.0 with client data](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v240): The first Remix release to land their Client Data RFC, which allows querying data APIs directly from the client (skipping the server).
* 📦 [React-Glow - Mouse-tracing glow effect](https://github.com/codaworks/react-glow)
* 📦 [next-export-i18n 3.0 - App Router support](https://github.com/martinkr/next-export-i18n)
* 🎥 [Ben Holmes - React server components from scratch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MaebEqhZR84): a great video showing how to implement a full RSC setup from scratch, including streaming, bundling, component routing, handling SSR, resolving client references...

- 👀 [Remix PR - unstable_serverBundles - split your route tree](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8332)
- 📖 [React Docs Update](https://github.com/reactwg/server-components/discussions/7): an overview of all the new official docs pages that were recently published on React.dev, including `use`, `cache`, `form` and many other experimental/canary APIs. There's even a "Coming Soon" section referencing docs for new [static resource preloading APIs](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459).
- 📖 [Updated Next.js testing docs - using App Router and TypeScript](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/testing)
- 📜 [Concurrent React, External Stores, and Tearing](https://interbolt.org/blog/react-ui-tearing/): An advanced article explaining how React can end up displaying an inconsistent UI (tearing). `useSyncExternalStore` helps to render a consistent UI, but it can also de-optimize your React transitions. See also the [Tearable Dots interactive demo](https://tearabledots.com/).
- 📜 [Explaining React's cache Function](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/explaining-reacts-cache-function): interactive article presenting the experimental React API, and how it differs from `useMemo`. It permits cross-component caching and can be used to preload data.
- 📜 [How to Get Rid of “Window is Not Defined” and Hydration Mismatch Errors in Next.js](https://medium.com/@eric.burel/how-to-get-rid-of-window-is-not-defined-and-hydration-mismatch-errors-in-next-js-567cc51b4a17): Shares 5 tips to avoid React hydration problems.
- 📜 [React Tricks: Fast, Fit and Fun](https://molefrog.com/notes/react-tricks): React perf lessons learned from building Wouter, a React router.
- 📜 [Netlify’s Disingenuous Survey-based Attack on Next.js (and Eleventy, too)](https://www.zachleat.com/web/netlify-and-nextjs/): Eleventy creator's criticism of how Netlify presented their State of Web Dev survey results.
- 📜 [Upcoming React and React-Native Conferences for 2024](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/upcoming-react-and-react-native-conferences-for-2024)
- 📜 [What is Reactivity?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-reactivity)
- 📜 [What are React Server Actions?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-are-react-server-actions)
- 📜 [What is React Suspense and Async Rendering?](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-react-suspense-and-async-rendering)
- 📜 [The Complete Guide To React Suspense](https://www.debugbear.com/blog/guide-to-react-suspense)
- 📜 [Migrating from Jest to Vitest for your React Application](https://dev.to/opensauced/migrating-from-jest-to-vitest-for-your-react-application-1b75)
- 📜 [Access the Search Params of a Request in Remix](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/access-the-search-params-of-a-request-in-remix)
- 📦 [Remix 2.4.0 with client data](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v240): The first Remix release to land their Client Data RFC, which allows querying data APIs directly from the client (skipping the server).
- 📦 [React-Glow - Mouse-tracing glow effect](https://github.com/codaworks/react-glow)
- 📦 [next-export-i18n 3.0 - App Router support](https://github.com/martinkr/next-export-i18n)
- 🎥 [Ben Holmes - React server components from scratch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MaebEqhZR84): a great video showing how to implement a full RSC setup from scratch, including streaming, bundling, component routing, handling SSR, resolving client references...
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [参与开发者国度调查 - 完成问卷即可获得虚拟礼包，内含免费数据、活动门票优惠码、课程、工具及平台兑换券等丰厚奖励！](https://developereconomics.net/?member_id=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=nl_ad3)
- 👀 [Remix PR - unstable_serverBundles - 拆分路由树](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/8332)
- 📖 [React文档更新](https://github.com/reactwg/server-components/discussions/7)：概述React.dev近期发布的所有新官方文档页面，包括`use`、`cache`、`form`等实验性/Canary API。甚至还有"即将推出"章节提及新的[静态资源预加载API](https://github.com/reactjs/react.dev/pull/6459)文档。
- 📖 [Next.js测试文档更新 - 使用App Router和TypeScript](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/testing)
- 📜 [并发React、外部存储与界面撕裂](https://interbolt.org/blog/react-ui-tearing/)：深度解析React如何导致界面显示不一致（撕裂）。`useSyncExternalStore`虽能确保界面一致性，但可能降低React过渡动画性能。另见[可撕裂点交互演示](https://tearabledots.com/)。
- 📜 [解读React的cache函数](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/explaining-reacts-cache-function)：通过交互式文章解析这个实验性API，及其与`useMemo`的区别。该API支持跨组件缓存，可用于数据预加载。
- 📜 [如何解决Next.js中"Window未定义"及水合不匹配错误](https://medium.com/@eric.burel/how-to-get-rid-of-window-is-not-defined-and-hydration-mismatch-errors-in-next-js-567cc51b4a17)：提供5个避免React水合问题的技巧。
- 📜 [React技巧：快速、精简且有趣](https://molefrog.com/notes/react-tricks)：从构建Wouter路由器中总结的React性能优化经验。
- 📜 [Netlify对Next.js（及Eleventy）基于调查的误导性攻击](https://www.zachleat.com/web/netlify-and-nextjs/)：Eleventy创始人批评Netlify呈现《Web开发现状》调查结果的方式。
- 📜 [2024年即将举办的React与React-Native大会](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/upcoming-react-and-react-native-conferences-for-2024)
- 📜 [什么是响应式编程？](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-reactivity)
- 📜 [什么是React服务端动作？](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-are-react-server-actions)
- 📜 [什么是React Suspense与异步渲染？](https://unicorn-utterances.com/posts/what-is-react-suspense-and-async-rendering)
- 📜 [React Suspense完全指南](https://www.debugbear.com/blog/guide-to-react-suspense)
- 📜 [将React应用从Jest迁移至Vitest](https://dev.to/opensauced/migrating-from-jest-to-vitest-for-your-react-application-1b75)
- 📜 [在Remix中获取请求的搜索参数](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/access-the-search-params-of-a-request-in-remix)
- 📦 [Remix 2.4.0支持客户端数据](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v240)：首个实现客户端数据RFC的版本，允许直接从客户端查询数据API（绕过服务端）。
- 📦 [React-Glow - 鼠标轨迹发光效果](https://github.com/codaworks/react-glow)
- 📦 [next-export-i18n 3.0 - 支持App Router](https://github.com/martinkr/next-export-i18n)
- 🎥 [Ben Holmes - 从零实现React服务端组件](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MaebEqhZR84)：演示完整RSC搭建过程，包括流式渲染、打包、组件路由、SSR处理及客户端引用解析等。

segments.content: All our content is **Project-Based-Learning** - which means that you will be learning the **skills** and adding **projects** to your portfolio at the same time!

segments.translated_content: 我们所有内容都采用**项目驱动式学习**——这意味着你将在学习**技能**的同时为作品集增添**实战项目**！

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
segments.translated_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content: [![Unistyles 2.0](/emails/issues/167/unistyles20.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/@notjustdev/live?sub_confirmation=1)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Unistyles 2.0](/emails/issues/167/unistyles20.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/@notjustdev/live?sub_confirmation=1)
segments.translated_content: [![Unistyles 2.0](/emails/issues/167/unistyles20.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/@notjustdev/live?sub_confirmation=1)

segments.content: [**Welcome to Unistyles 2.0!**](https://www.reactnativecrossroads.com/posts/unistyles-2-preview)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Welcome to Unistyles 2.0!**](https://www.reactnativecrossroads.com/posts/unistyles-2-preview)
segments.translated_content: [**欢迎来到Unistyles 2.0！**](https://www.reactnativecrossroads.com/posts/unistyles-2-preview)

segments.content: Unistyles is a cross-platform styling library. It is built as a superset of StyleSheet (if you use React Native, you’re probably familiar with StyleSheet.create …) similar to how TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript. First released just three months ago, it has since gained over 500 stars on GitHub and is now approaching its second major version with enhanced TypeScript types, no dependence on React Context anymore, and fresh C++ bindings to boost performance. A very interesting new feature is the addition of plugin support, which could enable some interesting new use cases.
segments.sourceMdx: Unistyles is a cross-platform styling library. It is built as a superset of StyleSheet (if you use React Native, you’re probably familiar with StyleSheet.create …) similar to how TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript. First released just three months ago, it has since gained over 500 stars on GitHub and is now approaching its second major version with enhanced TypeScript types, no dependence on React Context anymore, and fresh C++ bindings to boost performance. A very interesting new feature is the addition of plugin support, which could enable some interesting new use cases.
segments.translated_content: Unistyles是一个跨平台样式库。作为StyleSheet的超集构建（如果你使用React Native，可能熟悉StyleSheet.create...），类似于TypeScript之于JavaScript的关系。三个月前首次发布后，已在GitHub收获500+星标，现在即将推出第二个主要版本，增强TypeScript类型支持、不再依赖React Context，并采用全新C++绑定提升性能。插件支持的新特性尤为亮眼，这将开启更多有趣的使用场景。

segments.content:
* 💸 [AnimateReactNative - Premium and Custom React Native animations](https://www.animatereactnative.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
* 🐦 [Evan Bacon - "Expo Router v3 now has full support for popular web libraries like Radix, Tailwind, Shadcn UI, etc.](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1735011941431595149)
* 📖 [Expo Guide on How to use the New Architecture](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/new-architecture/): All `expo-*` packages except expo-updates support the new architecture. Support for `expo-updates` is planned for Expo SDK 51.
* 📜 [Expo 2023 - The year in review](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/12-20-2023-year-in-review): An overview of everything Expo launched this year, including Expo Orbit, Expo Router, EAS improvements, 3 SDKs, Expo Modules API and much more.
* 📜 [Xcode 15.1 image is now available on EAS Build](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/12-19-eas-build-xcode-15.1-image): Xcode 15.1 primarily fixes bugs.
* 📜 [Optimizing Performance in React-Native: Tips and Techniques](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/optimizing-performance-in-react-native-tips-and-techniques): Tutorial on how to apply memoization, use virtualized lists, optimize images, debounce, optimize bundle size and network requests
* 📜 [Building AR face masks in React Native](https://blog.logrocket.com/building-ar-face-masks-react-native/): How to load and apply 3D face masks using DeepAR
* 📜 [Introducing docs.infinite.red — A New Home for Infinite Red’s Documentation - Ignite, Reactotron, RN MLKit, Gluegun](https://shift.infinite.red/introducing-docs-infinite-red-a-new-home-for-infinite-reds-documentation-6f4b25f7a1a4)
* 📜 [Universal Medusa: The why, when and how of universal e-commerce apps with Medusa.js, Expo and Next.js](https://bidah.hashnode.dev/universal-medusa-the-why-when-and-how-of-universal-e-commerce-apps-with-medusajs-expo-and-nextjs)
* 📦 [React Native 0.73.1 is out](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.73.1): Adds `enableNetworkInspector` to enable Network panel and CDP handlers in inspector proxy, bumps CLI to 12.3.0
* 📦 [React Native Windows 0.73.1 is out](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.73.1): Brings React Native 0.73 to Windows
* 📦 [Repack 3.7 - 0.73 compat](https://github.com/callstack/repack/releases/tag/%40callstack%2Frepack%403.7.0)
* 🎥 [Ignite 9 video overview by Jamon Holmgren](https://youtu.be/QmkMsUYrTlk?si=p9rvLM-EMggZNcft)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship #021 - The React Native IDE with Krzysztof Magiera](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/021-the-react-native-ide-with-krzysztof-magiera)
* 🎙️ [React Native Radio 283 - From side-project to acquisition!](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-283-from-side-hustle-to-top-charts-with-simon-reggiani)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [AnimateReactNative - 高级定制版React Native动画库](https://www.animatereactnative.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
- 🐦 [Evan Bacon - "Expo Router v3现已全面支持Radix、Tailwind、Shadcn UI等流行Web库"](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1735011941431595149)
- 📖 [Expo新架构使用指南](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/new-architecture/)：除expo-updates外所有`expo-*`包均已支持新架构，expo-updates支持计划在Expo SDK 51中实现。
- 📜 [Expo 2023年度回顾](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/12-20-2023-year-in-review)：涵盖Expo Orbit、Expo Router、EAS改进、3个SDK版本、Expo Modules API等全年重大发布。
- 📜 [EAS Build现已支持Xcode 15.1镜像](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/12-19-eas-build-xcode-15.1-image)：Xcode 15.1主要修复错误。
- 📜 [React Native性能优化技巧](https://thoughtbot.com/blog/optimizing-performance-in-react-native-tips-and-techniques)：详解记忆化应用、虚拟化列表、图片优化、防抖、包体积与网络请求优化
- 📜 [在React Native中构建AR面部面具](https://blog.logrocket.com/building-ar-face-masks-react-native/)：使用DeepAR加载并应用3D面部面具
- 📜 [Infinite Red文档中心上线 - 集成Ignite、Reactotron、RN MLKit、Gluegun等工具文档](https://shift.infinite.red/introducing-docs-infinite-red-a-new-home-for-infinite-reds-documentation-6f4b25f7a1a4)
- 📜 [通用Medusa方案：基于Medusa.js、Expo和Next.js的全平台电商应用实践](https://bidah.hashnode.dev/universal-medusa-the-why-when-and-how-of-universal-e-commerce-apps-with-medusajs-expo-and-nextjs)
- 📦 [React Native 0.73.1发布](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.73.1)：新增`enableNetworkInspector`以启用检查器代理中的网络面板和CDP处理程序，CLI升级至12.3.0
- 📦 [React Native Windows 0.73.1发布](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.73.1)：为Windows平台带来React Native 0.73支持
- 📦 [Repack 3.7 - 支持0.73版本](https://github.com/callstack/repack/releases/tag/%40callstack%2Frepack%403.7.0)
- 🎥 [Jamon Holmgren讲解Ignite 9新特性](https://youtu.be/QmkMsUYrTlk?si=p9rvLM-EMggZNcft)
- 🎙️ [火箭飞船播客#021 - 与Krzysztof Magiera探讨React Native IDE](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/021-the-react-native-ide-with-krzysztof-magiera)
- 🎙️ [React Native广播第283期 - 从副项目到被收购的历程！](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-283-from-side-hustle-to-top-charts-with-simon-reggiani)
